-- | Parse DATABASE_URL into configuration types for Persistent

module Web.Heroku.Persist.Postgresql

-- | Build a <tt><a>PostgresConf</a></tt> by parsing <tt>DATABASE_URL</tt>
postgresConf :: Int -> IO PostgresConf
